page.title: 12 LEISURE
page.content:
Some of us spend our leisure time running in Wighill Park. The best thing about running is you can do it as a family and it keeps you fit. A dozen or so people ride horses. Many of the less active villagers like to garden. For indoor activities adults like to visit the Pub where they can play darts and table tennis. Adults can also play table tennis in the old school hall. The most popular children's activity is riding bikes. Inside they like to play snooker on their own tables or to watch television.
People have to make their own activities as there are no proper sports or leisure activities nearby. They have to jump in their car and go somewhere like Tadcaster for a sports centre.
